EU AI Act Regulations Fact Sheets

The EU AI Act regulates the development, deployment and use of artificial intelligence, including Large Language Models (LLMs) and applications like ChatGPT.

Verta's experts have extensively reviewed the act from a Data Science practitioner's perspective and prepared concise, actionable summaries for you to implement, including an Overview of the complete act and specific fact sheets on Data and Data Governance (Article 10) and Technical Documentation (Article 11).

Download these complementary fact sheets and begin preparing for the EU AI Act today.

Download

EU AI Act Regulations Fact Sheets

The EU AI Act regulates the development, deployment and use of artificial intelligence, including Large Language Models (LLMs) and applications like ChatGPT.

Verta's experts have extensively reviewed the act from a Data Science practitioner's perspective and prepared concise, actionable summaries for you to implement, including an Overview of the complete act and specific fact sheets on Data and Data Governance (Article 10) and Technical Documentation (Article 11).

Download these complementary fact sheets and begin preparing for the EU AI Act today.
